programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must evolve from soldier to analyst to operative to stop a terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a phone call from a woman they have never met.

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa’s seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he’s on board.

programme.title: Kiss The Girls
programme.desc: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains.

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; tonight they’re after the Warriors.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town
